data.lyric:
[ti:ALWAYS DO (Explicit)]
[ar:The Kid LAROI]
[al:F*CK LOVE (SAVAGE) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]ALWAYS DO (Explicit) - The Kid LAROI
[00:00.37]Lyrics by：Charlton Howard/Billy Walsh/Omer Fedi/Subhaan Rahman/Christian Laster
[00:00.75]Composed by：Charlton Howard/Billy Walsh/Omer Fedi/Subhaan Rahman/Christian Laster
[00:01.12]Said I wouldn't drink but I did the same day
[00:03.64]S**t I lied to your face like I always do
[00:06.70]Said I was gon' change both know that I can't
[00:09.27]S**t I'd rather take the blame like I always do
[00:12.64]I been the same ever since the first day
[00:15.03]Now you actin' surprised but b***h you always knew
[00:18.22]Maybe it's time for me to find somebody else
[00:22.01]Like I always do
[00:23.66]I know you can't believe me 'cause I never tell the truth but oh
[00:29.31]I wish that you could just see that it's only to protect you now
[00:35.07]How many times can somebody want the same pain
[00:37.45]Pain pain
[00:38.06]When the pressure put on me then I change things
[00:40.61]And every time that I run I know you gon' chase
[00:43.20]We always end up right back in the same place
[00:46.43]You-u-u-u-u wasted all my time with you-u-u-u-u
[00:50.48]Wishin' I was someone new-ew-ew-ew-ew
[00:53.29]Stuck up in my ways and you say that you hate it but
[00:56.47]You always knew
[00:58.06]Said I wouldn't drink but I did the same day
[01:00.69]S**t I lied to your face like I always do
[01:03.58]Said I was gon' change both know that I can't
[01:06.39]S**t I'd rather take the blame like I always do
[01:09.54]I been the same ever since the first day
[01:12.37]Now you actin' surprised but b***h you always knew
[01:15.33]Maybe it's time for me to find somebody else
[01:19.18]Like I always do
[01:21.07]Do do do do do like I always do
[01:26.69]Do do do do do like I always do
[01:31.85]I'm sorry I can't be the me you wanted
[01:36.16]I'm about to fall then you're all in
[01:38.86]I'm not the one to solve your problems
[01:41.64]No no
[01:42.04]'Cause I'm f**ked up too-oo-oo-oo-oo
[01:44.83]Wasted all my time with you-u-u-u-u
[01:47.56]Wishin' I was someone new-ew-ew-ew-ew
[01:50.39]Stuck up in my ways and you say that you hate it but
[01:53.70]You always knew
[01:55.42]Said I wouldn't drink but I did the same day
[01:57.95]S**t I lied to your face like I always do
[02:00.86]Said I was gon' change both know that I can't
[02:03.58]S**t I'd rather take the blame like I always do
[02:06.70]I've been the same ever since the first day
[02:09.52]Now you actin' surprised but b***h you always knew
[02:12.45]Maybe it's time for me to find somebody else
[02:16.53]Like I always do
[02:18.12]Do do do do do like I always do
[02:23.76]Do do do do do like I always do
data.trans:
[ti:ALWAYS DO (Explicit)]
[ar:The Kid LAROI]
[al:F*CK LOVE (SAVAGE) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.37]//
[00:00.74]//
[00:01.12]说了我不会再喝酒 但我说完当天就喝了
[00:03.64]可恶 我又当着你的面撒谎 一如往常
[00:06.70]说了我会改变 我俩都知道 我做不到
[00:09.27]可恶 我宁愿像往常一样接受指责
[00:12.64]从相遇第一天起 我就不曾改变过
[00:15.03]现在你那么惊讶 但是碧池 你一直都心知肚明
[00:18.22]也许我该另寻新欢了
[00:22.01]就像往常一样
[00:23.66]我知道你不能相信我 因为我从来不说实话 但是
[00:29.31]我希望你能明白 这都是为了保护你
[00:35.07]同样的痛苦 一个人愿意承受多少次
[00:37.45]痛苦
[00:38.06]当压力落在我身上 我就稍微变通一下
[00:40.61]每当我逃跑时 我都知道你会追上来
[00:43.20]我们总是会回到原点
[00:46.43]我把所有时间都浪费在你身上
[00:50.48]希望我能改过自新
[00:53.29]我一成不变 你说你很烦 但是
[00:56.47]你一直都心知肚明
[00:58.06]说了我不会再喝酒 但我说完当天就喝了
[01:00.69]可恶 我又当着你的面撒谎 一如往常
[01:03.58]说了我会改变 我俩都知道 我做不到
[01:06.39]可恶 我宁愿像往常一样接受指责
[01:09.54]从相遇第一天起 我就不曾改变过
[01:12.37]现在你那么惊讶 但是碧池 你一直都心知肚明
[01:15.33]也许我该另寻新欢了
[01:19.18]就像往常一样
[01:21.07]像我往常一样做
[01:26.69]像我往常一样做
[01:31.85]对不起 我没法成为你想要的那个我
[01:36.16]我快要放弃时 你又倾尽所有
[01:38.86]我没有办法帮你解决问题
[01:41.64]//
[01:42.04]因为我也是个有问题的人
[01:44.83]把我的时间都浪费在你身上
[01:47.56]希望我能改过自新
[01:50.39]我一成不变 你说你很烦 但是
[01:53.70]你一直都心知肚明
[01:55.42]说了我不会再喝酒 但我说完当天就喝了
[01:57.95]可恶 我又当着你的面撒谎 一如往常
[02:00.86]说了我会改变 我俩都知道 我做不到
[02:03.58]可恶 我宁愿像往常一样接受指责
[02:06.70]从相遇第一天起 我就不曾改变过
[02:09.52]现在你那么惊讶 但是碧池 你一直都心知肚明
[02:12.45]也许我该另寻新欢了
